name: Unessay
description:
Lucas is cute but has Body Dysmorphia Disorder. Are you going to try to understand, or will you be an asshole?

A game about trying to understand someone. 

WARNINGS: 

1. THIS GAME IS EXTREMELY CORNY. Advance with caution.

2. Constructive criticism is veeeery welcome. Also accepting praise. Thanks for not destroying my confidence.
